column4: Hi, i have bad frame rate when i launch 3d games (although glxgears runs ok) and bad sound. Im having "Intel Corporation Mobile 945GM/GMS/940GML Express Integrated Graphics Controller (rev 03)

graphic card. someone have any clue?
2007-06-20T11:12:00.000Z	FreeFull	Nalleman	The games are just made for better graphics cards. To play them get a better laptop
